data.text: Let us now praise famous men,
The Lord Gr. created.  manifested in them  great glory,
Such as did bear rule in their kingdoms,
Leaders of the people by their counsels,
Such as sought out musical tunes,
Rich men furnished with ability,
All these were honoured in their generations,
There be of them, that have left a name behind them,
And some there be, which have no memorial;
But these were men of mercy,
With their seed shall remain continually a good inheritance;
Their seed standeth fast,
Their seed shall remain for ever,
Their bodies were buried in peace,
Peoples will declare their wisdom,
Enoch pleased the Lord, and was translated,
Noah was found perfect and  righteous;
Everlasting covenants were made with him,
Abraham was a great father of a multitude of nations;
Who kept the law of the Most High,
Therefore he assured him by an oath,
In Isaac also did he establish likewise, for Abraham his fatherâ€™s sake,
And he made it rest upon the head of Jacob;
